messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] YAY!!!!!
messages.messageBody:
GO GIRL!!!!!!


On Sunday, January 18, 2004, at 03:27 PM, Elizabeth Roberts wrote:

> I am NOT a techie by any means....computer languages might as well be
> Greek...BUT having been asked about not having comments on my Blog...I
> finally went looking into it and SURPRISE! It wasn't NEARLY as
> difficult to add in as I thought it would be. A little reading and
> some cutting/pasting and so now I have comments enabled!
>
> Now...to figure out how to add links!
>
> MamaBeth
> http://everydaylives.blogspot.com
>

messages.subject: YAY!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: I am NOT a techie by any means....computer languages might as well be Greek...BUT having been asked about not having comments on my Blog...I finally went
messages.messageBody:
I am NOT a techie by any means....computer languages might as well be Greek...BUT having been asked about not having comments on my Blog...I finally went looking into it and SURPRISE! It wasn't NEARLY as difficult to add in as I thought it would be. A little reading and some cutting/pasting and so now I have comments enabled!

Now...to figure out how to add links!

MamaBeth
http://everydaylives.blogspot.com
